mapper.select: SELECT id FROM chats WHERE chat_code = #{chatCode}

SELECT c.chat_code, c.chat_name, u.uid owner_uid, c.join_enabled, c.create_time, c.update_time, o.object_name AS avatarObjectName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat_members cm WHERE cm.chat_id = c.id) member_count FROM chats c JOIN users u ON c.owner_id = u.id LEFT JOIN objects o ON c.object_id = o.id WHERE EXISTS( SELECT * FROM chat_members m WHERE c.id = m.chat_id AND m.user_id = #{userId} )

SELECT c.chat_code, c.chat_name, u.uid owner_uid, c.join_enabled, c.create_time, c.update_time, o.object_name AS avatarObjectName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat_members cm WHERE cm.chat_id = c.id) member_count FROM chats c JOIN users u ON c.owner_id = u.id LEFT JOIN objects o ON c.object_id = o.id WHERE c.id = #{chatId}
SELECT id AS chatId, chat_code AS chatCode, join_enabled AS joinEnabled, chat_password_hash AS chatPasswordHash FROM chats WHERE chat_code = #{chatCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chats (chat_code, chat_name, owner_id, chat_password_hash, join_enabled, object_id, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{chatCode}, #{chatName}, #{ownerId}, #{chatPasswordHash}, #{joinEnabled}, #{objectId}, NOW(), NOW())
